summary: A deranged serial killer infiltrates a popular club and slowly starts killing cocktail waitresses.
cast: Bruce Watson|Laura Hippe|Katie Saylor|Renie Radich|William Smith|Zitto Kazann|Dyanne Thorne|Jim Travis|Ray Galvin|John Alderman|Andre Tayir|Dick Yarmy|Milt Kogan|Judith Roberts|M.J. Kane
title: The Swinging Barmaids
